description:
<p>We are a busy, friendly practice, looking to recruit a part-time receptionist to work Monday to Fridays. We are looking for someone who can work in a demanding role, dealing with patients and Health Care Professionals across all levels. A calm and cheerful manner is required,  with excellent communication skills and telephone manner. </p>
<p>The ability to speak Welsh is desirable for this role but not essential.  The successful applicant will have the opportunity to join the NHS Pension Scheme. </p>

hiringOrganization.name: GP Practices - Hywel Dda University Health Board

title: Receptionist
